He hopes that one day, the success of his workshop will enable him to improve his quality of life and afford better living conditions. With your help, Juan David can make this possible!

loans.use: to buy more wood.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Julio es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales. 

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.

 El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de dos terneras que le de un buen impulso a su negocio.

573130	70191037
texts.en:
Farm work is one of the most difficult jobs today due to the great effort that one must put forth to progress.  Julio is a man who has never given up no matter the climate or the circumstances.  He is always ready to earn for his family.  

He gets up in the early hours of the morning to visit different farms to take care of his obligations at each location.  He alternates between this job and the sale of milk which he gets from his own cows.  

He would like to increase his working capital to guarantee the life of his businesses and this is why he is asking for a loan:  to invest it in the purchase of two calves who will give a good boost to his business.  

573130	70191037

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of two calves to increase the momentum of his business.

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 53 года, вдова. Образование-среднее. На протяжении 30 лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря своей трепетной работе и ответственности, на сегодняшний день Саламат имеет хорошее хозяйство: 3 коровы, 2 овцы. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Саламат обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота.
texts.en: Salamat is a 53-year-old widow. She has a high school diploma. In the past thirty years she has been earning a living from livestock breeding. Through her hard work and work ethics, she now owns three cows and two sheep. She makes about 10,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) a month. She is requesting a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to be able to buy additional livestock. She plans to reinvest the profit in her business and increase her herd.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Amin

texts.ru: Амин житель города Худжанд. Амин родился и вырос в городе Худжанд. Ему 38 лет. Родителя 52, 50 лет. Жене 30 лет. Дети еще маленькие. Его отец находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Мама и жена домохозяйка. Амин смелый, умный, и честный человек. Он 7 лет занимается своим бизнесом. Амин производит плитки (мазаечный). Ему нравится своя работа, и его доходы только от этой деятельностью.  Он производить плитки на заказ. Амин хочет расширить свою деятельность. Он решил купить разные модели колодка, что приобрести много клиентов. Амину нужны деньги для купли колодка. По этой причине он просит кредит. Вы можете поддержать его. Он заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Amin, 38, lives in Khujand where he was born and raised. His parents are 52 and 50 and his wife is 30 years old. His children are still small. His father is currently working abroad in Russia and his mother and wife are homemakers. Amin is a courageous, intelligent and honest man. He started his mosaic tiles business seven years ago. He loves his job and it is his only source of income. Hoping to expand his business, Amin decided to buy various mold models and expand his client base. Therefore he is applying for a loan. He thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy mold models and expand his business

loans.name: Gloria Estela

texts.es:
Gloria, a sus 23 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos. 
Debido a la falta de oportunidades laborales ha pasado por una situación económica muy difícil, busca opciones para salir adelante y desea montar su propio negocio, taller de elaboración de sandalias.

Por esta razón se motiva para solicitar el crédito, que invertirá en la compra de pegas, lijas, apliques metálicos, entre otros.

De esta forma, Gloria espera poder recibir los recursos necesarios para salir adelante al lado de su familia y poder ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor educación, además esto servirá como impulso para avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria, age 23, has three children.  Due to the lack of work opportunities, she has experienced a very difficult financial situation.  She is looking for options to get ahead.  She wishes to set up her own business, a shop for making sandals.

This is the reason that motivates her to request a loan.  She will use the loan to buy glue, elastic bands, and metal appliques, among others.

This way Gloria hopes to be able to get the resources needed in order to get ahead with her family and to be able to provide her children with a better education.  This will also serve as an impetus for her to make progress towards fulfilling her main dream, which is to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy glue, elastic bands, and metal appliques, among others.

loans.name: Alcides Manuel

texts.en:
Alcides is 47 years old and lives in the municipality of Sincelejo, located in the region of Sucre. He has been working as a fruit and vegetable distributor since 1997, after inheriting the business from his father.

He would like to be able to buy more farming products so that he can sell more fruit and vegetables. This would allow Alcides to increase his income on top of growing his clientele base and helping to create a culture of sustainability for his work.

Eventually, he hopes that his hard work will pay off and he will be able to improve the living conditions for himself and his two sons, for whom he wishes to provide a brighter future.

loans.use: to buy more farm products.

loans.name: Diego De Jesus

texts.en:
Diego is a 56-year-old father of two, who owns a small store in the west of Medellín. He is an extremely hardworking man who can be found in his business every day of the week, working for up to 14 hours a day.

He would like to use this loan in order to improve his inventory and wishes to buy more liquor, beer, cold meats and general groceries. He hopes that taking out this loan will translate to greater sales and sustainability for his business

Diego aspires to one day living in a new home that provides him with a better quality of life; his dedication to this dream is evident in the way he works, but he needs your help in order to help it fully come to fruition.

loans.use: to buy more liquor, beer, cold meats and general groceries.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru:
Мавчуда выбрала себе швейную деятельность, по причине, что она любить  кроить и шить. Сидя дома она зарабатывает на жизнь. У нее среднее образование. Мавчуда не смогла, поступит в университет, потому что у нее была финансовое проблемы. Но она очень хотела, поступит в университет, и получить высшую образованию.  Мавчуда очень благодарно Вам, что Вы помогли ей улучшить работу. Она продолжает свою работу без остановки, потому что доход от этой деятельностью обеспечить семью. Мавчуда мечтает приобрести себе современную компьютерную швейную машинку, и расширить деятельность. С большими надеждами Мавчуда обратилась за кредитом.
Ее мечта - в будущем открыть свое ателье по шитью национальной женской одежды.
texts.en: Mavjuda loves working as a tailor and earns a living without leaving home. She has a high school diploma. She dreamed of going to university but she did not manage it due to financial difficulties. She is grateful to you for helping her to improve her work. She continues working hard because this helps her to provide for her family. She dreams of buying a modern, computer-controlled sewing machine and get more work. She very much hopes that you will be able to help her. Her dream is to open her own female costume salon.

loans.use: to buy a modern, computer-controlled sewing machine

loans.name: Las Risueñas Group

texts.es:
En Veracruz existen comunidades donde el clima cálido y húmedo favorece el cultivo de la caña de azúcar. Otros productos destacables son el maíz, el frijol, el mango y los limones por lo que la agricultura juega un papel importante en la economía de la región. 
   En una de estas comunidades se conformó el grupo Las Risueñas, el nombre hace referencia a la característica que todos los miembros comparten. Ellos son: Gloria y Enriqueta dedicadas a la venta de comida; Luz, Paula, Alejandra, Erika y Anai, a la venta de ropa; Isabel, a la venta de pollo; Francisco, a la albañilería y Andrés quien maneja un taller mecánico. 
   Doña Enriqueta es mejor conocida como Queta; está casada con Víctor Manuel y tiene dos hijos, un joven de 18 años y una pequeña de 10. 
   Mientras su esposo e hijo se dedican a la cría de ganado, ella vende comida desde hace más de veinte años. Desde que comenzó no ha dejado de vender sus famosos chiles rellenos y sus ricos tamales pues son los platillos que más solicitan sus clientes. De igual modo implementó el servicio a domicilio a bordo de una bicicleta. Gracias a las ganancias pudo adquirir una motocicleta con la que entrega en menor tiempo sus pedidos, también pudo comprar una estufa, refrigerador, trastes para su pequeña cocina y cubrir los gastos de la educación de su hija. Además comenta, “hace dos años recibí mi primer préstamo y me propuse construir un local para estabilizarme, gracias a los beneficios que he recibido lo logré” 
   Para doña Queta el cliente es lo principal por ello cumple con sus necesidades y elabora la comida que le soliciten. Su objetivo primordial es ampliar su local, y sabe que la única manera de lograrlo es ampliando primero la cantidad de clientes. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de cacerolas, sartenes, ollas, aceite, un bulto de frijol y dos de azúcar que son los ingredientes principales para continuar satisfaciendo paladares. 
   El grupo entero agradece por las oportunidades de préstamo ya que de esta fortalecerá sus actividades.

*La fotografía fue tomada en el patio de Queta, atrás se puede ver el local que comenzó a construir; ella viste blusa rosa con negro.
texts.en:
In Veracruz there are communities where the warm humid climate facilitates growing the crop of sugar cane.  Other noteworthy products are corn, beans, mango and lemons, as agriculture is important to the local economy.  

In one of these communities a group was formed:  Las Risueñas,(the smiling ladies).  The name refers to the characteristic that all members share.  They are:  Gloria and Enriqueta who sell food, Luz, Paula, Alejandra, Erika and Anai who sell clothing, Isabel who sells chickens, Francisco the bricklayer and Andres who manages a mechanics shop.  

Dona Enriqueta is better known as Queta.  She is married to Victor Manuel and has two children, ages 18 and 10.  While her husband and son work with livestock, she has sold food for more than 20 years.  Since she started she has not stopped selling her famous chiles rellenos and her delicious tamales.  They are the most popular items with her customers.  

She also began a door to door service on bicycle.  Thanks to her earnings she was able to purchase a motorcycle which saves time on deliveries.  She was also able to buy a stove, refrigerator, dishes for her small kitchen and cover the expenses of her daughters education.  

She comments, "Two years ago I received my first loan and I decided to construct a store location to stabilize my business.  Thanks to the loans that I received, I was able to do this."  

For Dona Queta the customer is the most important.  She fills the orders that her customers place.  Her main goal is to increase her space.  She knows that the only way to do that is to first increase the number of customers that she serves.  She will invest the loan in the purchase of baking dishes, pans, pots, oil, a sack of beans and two sacks of sugar.  Those are the main ingredients that she needs to satisfy the palates she serves.  

The entire group is thankful for the opportunities that the loan offers, as the loans make their businesses stronger.  
*The photograph was taken in Queta's patio, behind you can see the place that is under construction.  She is wearing a pink blouse with black.

loans.use: to purchase baking dishes, pans, pots, oil and a sack of beans as well as two sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica lives in Ermera. She has been involved in business activities since 2013. She started with her own working capital of $200.

She is requesting a loan of $800 because she has a small kiosk. She is very interested in her business, so she will take a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more goods such as areca nuts, betel, aqua, cigarettes, sugar, soap, detergents, toothpaste, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

She needs the loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve the management of her business and increase her future income.

loans.use: to buy areca nuts, betel, aqua, cigarettes, sugar, soap, detergents, toothpaste, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Alejandro Antonio

texts.en:
Alejandro is 60 years old and lives in Monteria, where he makes a living running a store and providing for his wife and three children.

He is a long standing member of the community, and has been offering his service to the locals since 1985, working every day of the week for 8 hours. He is now looking to boost this small business to the next level, and especially wishes to purchase more stock to add to his inventory, hoping that this will increase his income and create greater sustainability for the future.

Alejandro dreams of passing his business down to his sons, but first needs to use this investment as a means of improving his store and leaving it to them in the best possible position. With your assistance Alejandro’s aspirations can become possible!

loans.use: to purchase more stock for his general store

loans.name: Olinda

texts.en:
Olinda is a businesswomen, and she is very interested in doing business. She has been involved in business activities since 2013 with her own working capital of $1000.00, and she has done her best on it. 

She is earning good money, but she still wants to improve her management of her business.  So, she is requesting a loan of $1000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more items to keep in her store including cooking oils, sugar, sweets, candles, biscuits, milk, Including soft drinks and hard drinks, and other things to sell. 

She is happy with the loan that she has been offered from Tuba Rai Metin so as to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy cooking oils, sugar, sweets, candles, biscuits, milk, Including soft drinks and hard drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Yenny Patricia

texts.es:
Yenny es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado. 

Desde hace unos meses inició su propio negocio, un salón de belleza que ubicó en un espacio de la casa donde reside, además, también presta el servicio a domicilio, según el requerimiento de sus clientes. 
Trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de silla, un secador para el cabello e insumos al por mayor, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Yenny manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Yenny is a woman who is devoted to her family and her work. Her tenacity and perseverance have enabled her to get ahead, overcoming various obstacles that have come her way.

A few months ago she opened her own business, a beauty salon, which she located in a part of the house she lives in. Furthermore, she also offers service in the home, according to her customers’ needs. 

She works every day for 10 hours.

She is seeking the loan to invest in the purchase of a chair, a hair drier and supplies at wholesale. This will allow her to continue with her work and offer a more complete service to her customers, with greater agility and efficiency. This will benefit the profit margin from her work.

Yenny says that her greatest wish is to be able to continue with her work, and build and strengthen her business to become more competitive in the market and thus have the ability to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a chair, a hair dryer, and supplies at wholesale, which will allow her to continue her work and offer her customers more complete service.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is taking a loan of $1,500.00 to improve her business.  She is married, and she has three children. 

She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as rice, noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt and coffee.  She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600.00.  

She is a hard-working woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt and coffee.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Dantani Village. Hassan joined Babban Gona to improve the lives of his family and children. Since joining Babban Gona, he no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to purchase better inputs to improve his yield. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Hassan will have access to high quality farm inputs such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the national average of 14 bags/hectare. 

This year, Hassan has set high goals of harvesting 40 bags of maize. With increased yields and incomes, Hassan has made it his ultimate goal to provide employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: To purchase improved farm inputs that will increase this farmer’s yields

loans.name: Candido

texts.en: A 1,000 USD loan is offered to Candido to repair his house. Candido started construction of his house, but he was not able to finish because he couldn't afford to buy materials such as cement, stone, sand, etc. Now he is requesting a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to help him finish off his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand, and other building supplies.

loans.name: Augusta

texts.en:
Augusta opened her shop in 2013 with her own working capital of 200 USD. She has applied for a 1,000 USD loan through Kiva's field partner Tuba Rai Metin to add more inventory to her shop, such as rice, sugar, water, cooking oils, crackers, milk, candles, tea, sardines, cigarettes, soy sauce, soft and hard drinks and other things to sell.

Augusta is grateful to have received this loan that will allow her to stock up and wants to use it as well to improve her management of her shop.

loans.use: to add more inventory to her shop and improve her management skills.

loans.name: Inocencio

texts.en: Inocencio loves his son very much and wishes to send him to university. He is applying for a 1000 USD loan through Kiva's field partner Tuba Rai Metin to pay for his tuition and school supplies. He hopes that furthering his son’s education will help him to have a brighter future.

loans.use: to pay for his son's tuition and school supplies.

loans.name: Arlaine

texts.en:
Clothing is indeed an unchangeable part of our lives. Due to this mere fact, Arlaine, 32, found herself in the clothing industry. 

She is a very hard-working entrepreneur from Intramuros, Manila City, Philippines. Richard, her husband, helps her to provide for their family needs. As of now, she operates a bridal gown business. Through this, she is able to earn a little profit, which she basically uses for primary expenditures within the household.  Here, she offers different designs of bridal gowns. Customers are attracted by her favorable prices and the many options offered. 

With a humble heart, Arlaine would like to avail herself of a 30,000 PHP loan, which will serve as an additional capital for her inventory. She will use her loan to improve her sales and will use her additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

In the future, she hopes to grow her business and have more branches. She also desires that her children complete their studies and have good health as well. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business, and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to expand her inventory of gowns for rent.

loans.name: Meyilkan

texts.ru: Мейилкан, 38 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. Она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав свой бизнес в 1998 году. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Мейилкан на сегодняшний день имеется 6 коров. На 0,70 Га земли она выращивает картофель, кукурузу. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса и увеличения получаемой прибыли, Мейилкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка телят для разведения. Мейилкан является лидером группы "Кашат", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы от кредита Мейилкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en: Meyilkan, 38, is married and has four children. Since 1998 she has been earning a living from farming. Through her hard work, she now owns six cows and grows corn and potatoes on a 0.7ha plot of land. She makes about 6,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) a month. Hoping to expand her business and increase her profit, she is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy additional calves for breeding. Meyilkan is the leader of the Kashat group, which consists of three members. She plans to reinvest the profit in her business and build livestock barns.

loans.use: to purchase some calves in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Eva Maria

texts.en:
Eva is a 45 year old native of Monteria, who lives with her husband and three young children. Since 2006 she has been selling agricultural products to her local customers in order to help provide for the family.

She is extremely dedicated to improving her business, and can be found working 7 days a week, attending to her clients. Most of all she would like to improve her food sales, and also wishes to buy seeds to plant and cultivate. 

She one day dreams of paying for her children’s education whilst improving their living conditions- with your help this can be made possible!

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant and cultivate

loans.name: Turganbu

texts.ru: Турганбу, 53 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. Она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав свой бизнес в 1992 году. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Турганбу на сегодняшний день имеется корова, 50 овец, лошадь. На 1,30 Га земли она выращивает картофель, кукурузу, клевер. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 6,900 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса и увеличения получаемой прибыли, Турганбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка телят для разведения. Турганбу является участником группы "Кашат", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и постройку сараев для скота.
texts.en: Turganbu, 53, is married and has three children. She has been earning her living from farming since 1992, when she started her business. Through her hard work, she now owns a cow, fifty sheep and a horse. She grows potatoes, corn and clover on a 1.3ha plot of land. She makes about 6,900 Kyrgyz som (KGS) a month. Hoping to expand her business and increase her profit, she is requesting a loan of 15,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy additional calves for breeding. Turganbu is a member of the Kashat group, which consists of three members. She plans to reinvest the profit in her business and build livestock barns.

loans.use: to buy calves for increasing of her herd

loans.name: Eduvina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Eduvina es una joven emprendedora de 19 años de edad, estudió hasta 6° grado, abandonó los estudios ya que se fue a trabajar a la ciudad, actualmente está acompañada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar como cobrador de un bus, por el momento no tiene hijos y por lo tanto solo vive con su pareja.

Eduvina se dedica a trabajar como doméstica en la ciudad, su horario de trabajo inicia a las 7:00 am y termina a las 5:00 pm, ella tiene que lavar, planchar, hacer limpieza y cocinar, ella decidió dedicarse a este rubro ya que no pudo continuar con sus estudios y le es difícil encontrar mejores oportunidades.

Con el crédito ella ayudará a su padre y esposo a comprar abonos, venenos y plaguicidas para aplicarlos a los cultivos de maíz y frijol. Comprando todo esto ellos como familia podrán tener buena producción de granos básicos.

Ella desea poder construir su casa propia tener hijos y verlos crecer en un lugar sano, desea que ellos puedan tener el estudio que a ella le fue negado, también darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y poder tener una buena producción de granos para asegurar el alimento de su familia.
texts.en:
Eduvina is a young entrepreneur of 19 years of age. She studied until grade 6, then left school to go and work in the city. Currently, she's married and her husband works as a bus collection agent. For now she has no children and so lives with only her partner.

Eduvina is a cleaner in the city. Her work day starts at 7:00am and ends at 5:00pm. She has to wash, iron, clean and cook. She decided to take on this work as she couldn't continue her studies and it's hard to find better work opportunities.

With this loan, she will help her husband and father by buying manure, poison and pesticides to apply to the corn and bean crops. Buying all of this will help her whole family as they will produce a good harvest of basic grains.

She hopes to build a house and have children and see them grow in a healthy place; she hopes they have access to an education, one that she was denied. She'd also like to give her family a better quality of life and be able to produce a good harvest to ensure there is food for her family.

loans.use: buy manure, poison and pesticides to apply to her corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is requesting a loan of $1,000.00 to buy additional supplies to keep in her store, including rice, detergents, cooking oils, chips, Including soft drinks and other things to sell. She has been doing business since 2012 with her own working capital of $800.00. 

She wants to open a big store in the future. So she is taking this loan to improving her management for her business, so that her dream is can be achieved.

loans.use: To buy rice, detergents, cooking oils, chips, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Mariazinha

texts.en: Mariazinha is requesting a loan of $1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to complete her house. With the loan she will buy more materials such as ceramic, sand, cement, stone, wire, wood, etc. Mariazinha is very happy to have this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy ceramic, sand, cement, stone, wire, wood and other materials.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
A $1,200 loan is offered to Georgina to improve her business. Georgina lives in Ermera, and she is a businesswoman. Most of her daily income is from her store, so she still is happy to do business.

She opened her business in 2014 with her own working capital of $500. She was going to add money to her principal amount to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as aqua, biscuits, milk, sardines, cooking oils, sweets, eggs, soap, candles, noodles, soft drinks, and other things to sell. It has become her activity, so she is happy to do this every day.

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy aqua, biscuits, milk, sardines, cooking oils, sweets, eggs, soap, candles, noodles, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Jose Nolberto

texts.es:
El señor José de 42 años de edad, es casado vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación, ubicada en una aldea  al sur de Honduras,  se dedica desde hace 25 años a la pesca artesanal sus ventas la realiza en su casa de habitación.
Don José sus clientes son vecinos de su comunidad, su actividad es de lunes a sábado, tiene casa propia y cuenta con un empleado que le ayuda a pescar, también se dedica a sacar copias ya que tiene una impresora en su casa. 
Don José solicita el préstamo para la compra de una de red de pesca  9x200 yardas valorada en la cantidad que solicita, espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante en su negocio y poder seguir apoyando a su familia con los gastos del hogar.
Su sueño es comprarse una lancha   y obtener ganancias. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras -   Mayo del  2015.
texts.en:
José is 42 years old. He is married and lives in his house with his wife in a village in the south of Honduras. He has been working at small scale fishing for 25 years. He sells fish from his house. José's clients are his neighbors in the community. He works from Monday to Saturday and has an employee that helps him fish. He also makes copies as he has a printer in his house.

José is requesting a loan to buy a 9 by 200 yard fishing net, valued at the amount requested for the loan. He hopes that this investment will allow him to get ahead with his business and be able to continue to support his family with the household expenses. His dream is to buy a boat and make more money.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net for his business.

loans.name: Mavzunai

texts.ru: Мавзунаи 24 летняя девушка. Она из района Фархор. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Муж занимается таксистом на районе. Мавзунаи работает на земле, где имеет 1 Га земельный участок. Она в этом году посадила овощи и фрукты. Мавзунаи трудолюбивая дехканка. Она планирует заниматься животноводством. Ей нравится домашние животные, и нравится доить коров обеспечить семью молоками и молочными продуктами. Мавзунаи просит кредит для купли несколько скота и для старта бизнеса. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей приобрести скота и начать бизнес. Мавзунаи нужна Ваша поддержка, поддержите ее!
texts.en: Mavzunai, 24, comes from Farkhor. She has a son and a daughter. While Mavzunai's husband works as a taxi driver, she works the land. She is a hardworking peasant.  This year she has planted vegetables and fruit on her 1ha plot. She plans to start breeding livestock. She likes livestock. She likes to milk cows and provide her family with dairy products. She is requesting a loan to be able to buy some livestock and start a livestock breeding business. Mavzunai needs your help, please support her.

loans.use: Для купли скота и для старта бизнеса.

loans.name: Lenie

texts.en:
Lenie is married and has three children. She has had a welding shop in the Philippines for the past eight years. She also earns extra income by buying and selling recycled materials.

Lenie has taken out and successfully repaid a prior loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF. She is now applying for a 19,500 PHP loan to buy a welding machine and other supplies such as a welding rod and metal for her business.

Lenie dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine and other supplies for her welding shop.

loans.name: Zhyldyz

texts.ru: Жылдыз, 31 год, замужем, мать 3 детей. Она на протяжении 9 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав свой бизнес с 50,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Жылдыз на сегодняшний день имеется 8 коров, лошадь. На 1,0 Га земли она выращивает картофель, кукурузу. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 5.700 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса и увеличения доходов семьи, Жылдыз обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка телят. Жылдыз является участником группы "Кашат", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Zhyldyz, 31, is married and has three children. Having started her business nine years ago with 50,000 som (KGS), she has been earning a living from farming. Through her hard work, she now owns eight cows and a horse. She grows corn and potatoes on a 1ha plot of land. She makes about 5,700 Kyrgyz som (KGS) a month. Hoping to expand her business and increase her profit, she is requesting a loan of 35,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy additional calves for breeding. Jyldyz is a member of the Kashat group, which consists of three members. She plans to reinvest the profit in her business.

loans.use: to buy additional calves for increasing her herd

loans.name: Kyimat

texts.ru: Кыймат, 52 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Кыймат высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Кыймат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 21,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кыймат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Кыймат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kyimat, 52, is married and has three children. She has a university degree and has been earning a living from livestock breeding. Through her hard work, she owns three cows.  Her monthly income amounts to about 21,000 som (KGS). She is requesting a loan of 100,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to be able to buy cows for fattening up and resale. She plans to reinvest the profit in more livestock.

loans.use: to buy some cows for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en: This loan of $800 will allow Rosa to send her son to post-secondary school. She will use the loan to pay for tuition and school supplies. Rosa loves her son very much and hopes that further education will help him to have a brighter future.

loans.use: To pay tuition and cover school supplies

loans.name: Albertina Isabel

texts.es: ALBERTINA ISABEL: Es una mujer alegre, pertenece a la etnia miskita de la Ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada. Ella cuenta con una experiencia de 7 años de ser enfermera, su esposo trabaja de manera informal como mecánico. Con el primer crédito otorgado por Pana Pana y financiado por KIVA,  logro cambiarle la madera a la vivienda de su mamá. Con el propósito de reducir el hacinamiento y tener una vivienda digna está solicitando su segundo financiamiento para iniciar la construcción de su vivienda de concreto, comprar materiales de construcción: Arena, cemento, hierro, zinc, clavos y madera.  Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una vivienda bonita y segura.
texts.en:
Albertina Isabel is a happy woman. She is of Miskita ethnicity, from the city of Bilwi, in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She is 31 years old and married. 

She has 7 years experience as a nurse. Her husband works informally as a mechanic. 

With the first loan granted by Pana Pana and financed by KIVA, she was able to change the wood in her mother’s home. 

With the goal of reducing overcrowding and of having a decent home, she is seeking a second loan to begin construction on her concrete home, to buy construction materials: sand, cement, rebar, metal roofing, nails and wood. She and her husband dream of having a pretty and secure home.

loans.use: to begin construction on her concrete home, and to buy construction materials: sand, cement, rebar, metal roofing, nails and wood.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra, a sus 42 años de edad es una mujer con visión, emprendedora y muy activa; por falta de experiencia laboral le ha sido difícil conseguir oportunidades de trabajo, por lo cual ha decidido iniciar su propio negocio de venta de mercancía y productos de uso personal, para lo cual requiere el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de surtido al por mayor como batidos nutricionales con el fin de aprovechar los descuentos que le ofrecen y así tener variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes que inicialmente serían familiares, vecinos y amigos del sector. 

Con esto podrá obtener ingresos para aportar al sustento de su hogar y podrá invertir más en su negocio así, podrá ir avanzando para convertirse en una líder del negocio, ser altamente productiva y muy competitiva a nivel comercial, así podrá mejorar su nivel de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra, 42, is a woman with a vision; she's an entrepreneur and very active. For lack of work experience, it has been very difficult to find work opportunities and so she decided to start her own business. She sells personal use merchandise and products. She is requesting a loan to invest in an assortment of wholesale items, like nutritional shakes in order to take advantage of the discounts that are offered and to provide variety to her clients who are also her family, neighbors and friends from the area.

With this loan, she'll be able to generate income to help support her household and invest more in her business; move forward in order to turn into a leader of that business; be highly productive and very competitive at the commercial level so she can improve her level of income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy a wholesale assortment of products, like nutritional shakes in order to take advantage of the discounts that are offered.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy laminate and nails to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Cholponai

texts.ru: Чолпонай, 59 лет, вдова, есть сын, он во всем помогает маме. У Чолпонай среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1995 году. Благодаря упорному труду, Чолпонай на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы. Также у нее есть 3,0 ГА собственной земельной доли, на которой она выращивает пшеницу для реализации. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 7,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, так как сельское хозяйство - единственный и стабильный источник доходов, Чолпонай решила и дальше его развивать, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и обработку почвы для выращивания экологически-чистой пшеницы. Проведенные мероприятия позволят ей увеличить доходы семьи и дальше развивать бизнес.
texts.en: Cholponai, 59, is a widow. She has a son who helps her mother with everything. She has a high school diploma and from 1995 has been making a living from farming. Through her hard work, she owns two cows. She also owns a 3.0ha plot of land where she grows wheat for sale. Her monthly profit amounts to 7,000 som (KGS). This money is not enough for a dignified life. Since farming is the only stable source of income, Cholponai decided to develop futher in this direction. She is requesting a loan of 50,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy sheep and fertilizer for growing organic wheat. She plans to invest the profit in expanding her business and to increase her family’s income.

loans.use: to cultivate her land for growing organic wheat and to buy some sheep in order to increase her family's income

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 61 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, coffee, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Leonora has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from buying and selling fish.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, coffee, and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store (general store).

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru: Гульмира, 48 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Семья очень трудолюбивая и дружная. У Гульмиры - высшее образование, она работает врачом-акушером в поликлинике. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Гульмира решила в этом году отремонтировать и утеплить дом и крышу, и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) для покупки пластиковых окон, балок. Гульмира является лидером группы "Медики.", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы Гульмира планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий семьи.
texts.en: Gulmira, 48, is married and has three children. Her family is very hardworking and close-knit. Gulmira has a university degree and works as a midwife in a polyclinic. Her monthly income amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS). She is requesting a loan of 70,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy construction materials for renovating her house and adding an insulation layer to her house and roof. Gulmira is the leader of the Medics group, which consists of three members. She plans to invest the profit in the improvement of her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy boards and plastic windows for insulation of her house

loans.name: Libania

texts.en:
Libania is a businesswoman and she has very great interest in doing business. She has been involved in business activities since 2012, with her own working capital of $500, and she does the best she can with it. 

Libania has a small store so she is requesting a loan of $800 from Tuba Rai Metin to add to her working capital because her capital is not enough. She will use this loan to buy additional items to keep in her store including sugar, eggs, shampoo, milk, noodles, detergents, cooking oils, and Including drinks (soft and hard drinks) and other things to sell. With this loan  she wants to improve her business.

loans.use: To buy sugar, eggs, shampoo, milk, noodles, detergents, cooking oils, Including drinks (soft and hard drinks) and other things to sell.

loans.name: María Del Rocío

texts.es: María del Rocío tiene 26 años, es casada, tiene tres hijos y vive en la Ciudad de México, ella estudio una licenciatura en administración industrial, es una mujer constante, dedicada, apasionada por aprender cosas nuevas y gran entusiasta de viajar. Por esa razón, María del Roció inicio hace 7 años una agencia dedicada a la organizaciones de excursiones y viajes, negocio que ofrece a escuela e instituciones públicas y privadas, por eso ella solicita un préstamo de MXN 10,000 para poder pagar una certificación ante la secretaria de turismo y darle más valor a su agencia. Ella se siente orgullosa de todo lo que ha cumplido y agradece mucho a las personas que le ayudaran a lograr un objetivo mas en su vida.
texts.en:
María del Rocio is 26 years old, is married, has three children and lives in Mexico City.  She studied and received a degree in Industrial Administration.  She is consistent, steady and passionate about learning new things and travel.  

For this reason, seven years ago, Maria del Rocio started an agency dedicated to organizing excursions and trips. She offers the trips to schools and public or private institutions.  This is why she is asking for a loan to be able to pay for a certification from the Secretary of Tourism to give more credibility to her agency.  

She is proud of all that she has accomplished and thanks the people who will help her achieve one more objective in her life.

loans.use: to pay for certification from the Secretary of Tourism.

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es: Maria de 36 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros,  desde hace varios  años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia, Maria esta solicita un crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior de diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 36, runs a business selling under garments for men and women.

She's been running this business for many years and counts on many fixed clients with whom she can keep her business afloat; with her earnings, she can cover some of the household expenses.

She lives with her two children in her own house.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy a large quantity of under garments of different prices, styles and colors so she can count on more clients and that way improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy a large quantity of under garments.

loans.name: Inobat

texts.ru: Инобат жительница города Исфара. Она развелас смужем. У нее двое детей. Детям 20 и 18 лет. Инобат онда воспитывает и кормит детей. Без мужа тяжело вырости детей. Инобат имеет бизнес, она занимается торговлей деятельностью. В течение 10 лет Инобат приобритела опыт и много клиентов. Она научилась провильно общаться с клиентами и вести данный бизнес. Ей на работе помогает ее дочь. Инобат продает женские летние обуви и летные детские одежды. Торговляя деятельность является основной, потому что доход от этого бизнеса прокормить детей. Она собирается увеличить товарооборот путем перевоза обуви и одежды. Для перевоза у нее нет сумма денег, и она решила взять кредит. Инобат надеется на Вашу поодержку.  Поддержитее ее достичь своих целей.
texts.en:
Inobat lives in Isfar with her two children who are 20 and 18 years old. She is divorced and is the sole provider for her children. Raising children without a husband is tough. 

Inobat has a business: she sells female summer shoes and children’s summer clothes. In the past ten years she gained a lot of experience and acquired many clients, learned how to manage the business and deal with customers. Her daughter helps her to run the business. 

This business is Inobat's only source of income and it allows her to provide for her children. She plans to increase turnover by transporting shoes and clothes. However, she does not have enough money for it and is requesting a loan. She hopes that you will be able to help her. Please help her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to transport shoes and clothes and increase turnover

loans.name: Razhap

texts.ru: Ражап, 46 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Ражап - неоконченное высшее образование, она работает врачом-акушером в поликлинике. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 7,700 сом (KGS). Ражап решила отремонтировать и утеплить дом и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) для покупки батарей, труб и обоев. Ражап является участником группы "Медики.", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы Ражап планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий семьи.
texts.en: Razhap, 46, is married and has three children. Razhap went to college but did not finish it. She works as a midwife in a polyclinic. Her monthly income amounts to about 7,700 som (KGS). She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy heaters, pipes and wallpaper. Razhap is a member of the Medics group, which consists of three members. She plans to invest the profit in the improvement of her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy heaters, pipes and wallpaper and improve her family's living conditions

loans.name: Marta

texts.en:
Marta is taking a loan of $800 (USD) to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family while her husband is a farmer. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as coffee, sugar, salt, noodles and bread.
Marta opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $100 (USD). She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future. Marta is happy with this loan because it helps improve her living conditions for the future.

loans.use: to buy coffee, sugar, salt, noodles and bread.

loans.name: Elena Maria

texts.es:
Elena María tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su conyugue y su menor hijo en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Elena María se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Elena María espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elena María is 31 years old and lives with her spouse and her young son in the rural zone in the district of Cayaltí, which is located in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast.  The residents of this district work primarily in agriculture, livestock and business.

Elena María works raising and selling small animals such as chickens, hens, ducks, turkeys and others. Her business is run out of her home. She has five years of experience in this business and she has great personal and professional references in the region. This loan will be used to purchase a large quantity of animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, hens and others as well as feed for the animals.  With this investment, Elena María hopes to provide her customers with better service, which will allow her to increase her earnings and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase animals as well as feed for the animals.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru: Шоира серьезная и честная женщина. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Детям 17 и 5 лет. Ее муж заботливый человек. Он сейчас находится на заработках загранице, чтобы прокормить семью. Шоира тоже имеет свой бизнес, и она зарабатывает, помогает мужу обеспечить семью. Шоира у себя дома предоставляет услуги портнихи более 10 лет. Она с детства мечтала стать швеей. На фотографии снята Шоира и ее старая швейная машинка. Этой машинки много лет. Она уже устарела, и не выполняет свои функции достаточно хорошо. На таком машинке Шоира не может шить  нормально и взять больше заказов. И она решила купить себе новую современную швейную машинку. Для приобретения швейной машинки у Шоиры нет денег, и она обратилась за кредитом. Вы можете поддержать ее приобрести желаемую машинку.
texts.en: Shoira is an earnest and honest woman. She is married and has two children, 17 and 5 years old. Her husband is a caring man who is now working in Russia to provide for the family. Shoira has a business that helps her to do her share. She works as a tailor. She has been in this trade for ten years and she works from home. She dreamed of becoming a tailor since childhood. This image portrays Shoira with her old sewing machine, which does not function properly and prevents her from taking on more work. She decided to buy a more modern sewing machine but since she does not have the money to buy one, she is requesting a loan. You can help her to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es:
La señora  María de 31  años de edad,  tiene 02 hijos que dependen de ella, vive con su esposo en casa propia  ubicada en una comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 04 años al negocio de venta de tortillas.
Doña María  su negocio tiene ubicado en su casa y ahí llegan los clientes a comprarle también su esposo vende verduras y le apoya económicamente es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante.
Doña María está solicitando el préstamo para compra de maíz, leña y cal y para comprar verduras como papa, yuca, pataste, plátanos, etc. para apoyar a  su esposo que vende las verduras en un carro que renta y genera les genera otro ingreso. Con el apoyo del préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos  y su calidad de vida es su tercer crédito que solicita.
Uno de sus sueños  es mejorar su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
María is 31 years old and has two children that are dependent on her. She lives with her husband in their own house in a community in San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She has been working selling tortillas for four years.

María's business is located in her house and her clients come to buy from her. Her husband sells vegetables and she helps him economically. She is an enterprising woman who wants to get ahead.

María is requesting a loan to buy corn, wood, lime, potatoes, yucca, plantains, chayote, etc. for her business, to support her husband who sells vegetables from a cart that he rents to generate another income. With the help of the loan she hopes to improve her income and her quality of
living. This is her third loan. Her dream is to make improvements on her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, lime, potatoes, yucca, plantains, chayote, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Life may not be so easy as it seems, but when you have hope, nothing would be impossible. That's what Mercedes believes and she's thankful that you let her borrow an amount that helped her a lot in her food stall business. Because of that, she was able to increase her profit in such a way that she was able to supply her family with their basic needs at home.

She would like to access again another loan that she would use to buy additional raw ingredients for her recipes and other materials needed in cooking or selling. A PHP 20,000 loan is enough to cater these. She really hopes that you'll entrust her again this time. You know that the main reason why she does persevere in her business is to provide and invest for her family a better future. 

She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients for her recipes and other materials needed in cooking or selling.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for five years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 25 лет, не замужем, детей нет. У Айнуры- неоконченное высшее образование, она работает врачом-акушером в родильном доме. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 6,500 сом (KGS). Айнура решила утеплить дом и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) для установки системы отопления. Айнура является участником группы "Медики.", всего в группе состоят 3 человека. Доходы Айнура планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий семьи.
texts.en: Ainura, 25, is single and does not have any children. Ainura went to college but did not finish it. She works as a midwife in a hospital. Her monthly income amounts to about 6,500 som (KGS). She is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank in order to buy and install a heating system in her house. She is a member of the Medics group, which consists of three members. She plans to invest the profit in the improvement of her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to install a heating system in her house

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mirna tiene 35 años de edad, estudió hasta 1° grado, sus padres la sacaron de la escuela debido a que vivían en un lugar extraviado y era muy peligroso ir de su casa a la escuela, ahora está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar como jornalero, tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos estudian y uno trabaja.

Mirna se dedica al cuido de aves de corral, ella compra los pollos y los cría hasta que estén buenos para vender, también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y oficios domésticos, todas estas actividades las aprendió de su madre y ahora le ha servido a Mirna para sacar adelante a su familia.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar más pollos, materiales de construcción para reparar la granja y comprará concentrado. 

Ella sueña con tener más pollos, sacar buenas ganancias para invertir en su casa y ayudar a sus hijos a que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Mirna is 35 years old and has a first grade because her parents pulled her out of school because they lived in a remote area and it was too dangerous for her to travel between their home and school.  She is now married and her husband works as a day laborer. They have three children, two of which are in school and one who works. 

Mirna works raising poultry. She purchases her chickens and raises them until they are ready to be sold. She also works raising pigs and doing housekeeping.  She learned these trades from her mother, and it has now helped her to get her own family ahead.

Mirna is seeking this loan to purchase more chickens, purchase feed, and to purchase construction materials to repair her farmhouse.  She dreams of having more chickens, generating more earnings to invest in her home and helping her children to finish their educations.

loans.use: purchase chickens, feed, and construction materials to repair her farmhouse.

loans.name: Cancio

texts.en: This loan of $1000 will allow Cancio to send his wife to university.He will use the loan to pay for tuition and school supplies. Cancio loves his wife very much and hopes that further education will help his to have a brighter future.

loans.use: To enable his wife to attend university and buysupplies

loans.name: Zulfiyahon

texts.ru: Зулфияхон из города Исфара. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Ее муж занимается торговлей деятельностью, он продают фрукты на рынке. Зулфияхону научил ее муж заниматься торговлей деятельностью. Зулфияхон не сидит дома без дел и ведет свой бизнес. 5 лет она продвигает свой бизнес. Сейчас сезон арбуза и дыня, она перевезла больше арбузов на продажу. Ее торговля идет хорошо, Зулфияхон хочет расширить деятельность и увеличить товарооборот. Она просит кредит для перевоза арбуз и расширить деятельность. У нее возникли проблема финансами, и по этой причине Зулфияхон обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Zulfiyahon, 28, comes from Isfara. She is married and has three children. Her husband sells fruit at the local market. He taught Zulfiyahon how to sell groceries, and she has been doing it for five years. Zulfiyahon keeps busy and does not waste her time. It is the season of watermelons and melons, and she has brought a large number of watermelons for sale. The business is profitable, and Zulfiyahon would like to expand it by increasing turnover. She is requesting a loan to be able to transport watermelons. Since her own money is not enough, she is applying for a loan. She believes that you will be able to help her to expand her business.

loans.use: to transport watermelons and expand her business

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз  хорошая жена и чудесная мать троих детей. Ей 36 лет. Дилафруз живет в городе Вахдат. Её муж находится на заработках в России. Он трудовой мигрант. Дилафруз сама занимается воспитанием детей и одновременно продает продукты питания ( макарон, рис, сахар и т.д.)  в магазине. Она получает хорошую прибыль от этой деятельности. В данный момент у Дилафруз осталось мало ассортимента  в магазине, и она хочет закупить новые продукты и расширить свой бизнес. Но для этого у неё недостаточно денег, поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. Дилафруз очень верит, что с вашей помощью она сможет расширить свой бизнес и улучшит жизненные условия своей семьи. Она надеется, что после расширения бизнеса её муж сможет возвратиться на родину, и они смогут вести этот бизнес вместе.
texts.en: Dilafruz, 36, is a good wife and a wonderful mother of three children. She lives in Vakhdat. While her husband is earning money abroad as a migrant labourer, Dilafruz is responsible for raising their children. She also sells groceries (pasta, rice, sugar, etc.) This business makes a good profit. At the moment Dilafruz has a limited number of goods in her shop. She would like to purchase more goods and expand her business. Since she does not have enough money to achieve her goals, she is requesting a loan. She believes that you will be able to help her to expand her business and to improve her family’s living conditions. She hopes that, if everything works according to her plan, her husband will be able to return home and they will be able to run their business together.

loans.use: to buy new groceries and expand her business

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
Luisa would like you to know her full appreciation and thanksgiving because her previous loan has indeed helped her in buying additional products for her business. She faithfully repaid her recent loan which she had used in buying additional products for her inventory. 

But still, she would like to improve her sales more. With this, she is humbly requesting for another 
PHP 15,000 which she will utilize to purchase more home product sales. Preferably, her customers will likely buy more items if she has more options. 

In some time at the future, she wants to improve their lives through growing her business. It is because she wants to finally get out and conquer financial difficulties. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase more home product sales.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe works hard to support her family. She is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

Fe requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more stocks of ingredients, like canned goods, eggs, meat, and fish.

Fe has been in this business for ten years now. She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of ingredients, like canned goods, eggs, meat, and fish.

loans.name: Cipriano Danilo

texts.es:
Cipriano es un productor de café de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en su pequeña finca de  1.4 hectáreas de café los cuales produce bajo los criterios de certificación comercio justo.

En los últimos años, este productor ha logrado una cosecha de aproximadamente 24 quintales de café pergamino, lo cual para este año ha tomado como un reto, proponiéndose incrementar este rendimiento productivo y alcanzar una cosecha de al menos 35 quintales.

Para esto, Cipriano está solicitando un financiamiento que le permita la compra de insumos y fertilizantes, para asegurar la demanda nutricional de su plantación. Esta inversión se sumará al esfuerzo y trabajo que él y su familia vienen realizando en su finca para alcanzar mayores resultados y de esa forma mejorar su condición económica.
texts.en:
Cipriano is a coffee grower in northern Nicaragua. He lives with his wife and their three children on a small farm. He grows coffee on 3.5 acres of land, and his business complies with all fair trade certification requirements.  

Over the past few years, he has been able to obtain harvests of approximately 2,400 lbs of parchment coffee. He has challenged himself to increase this yield, and his set goal is to produce a minimum of 3,500 lbs this year.

In order to meet this goal, Cipriano is requesting financing so that he can buy supplies and fertilizer to secure his crops' nutritional demand. This investment will add on to his and his family's effort and hard work on the farm. It will enable him to increase results and improve his financial situation.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.en: Natalia is taking a loan of $700.00 to improve her business.She is married, has one child and is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy petrol and diesel. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $100.00. Natalia is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy petrol and diesel for sale

loans.name: Eber Naun

texts.es:
Nahum es un agricultor de 30 años dedicado hace ya más de 10 años a la producción de café con valores agregados como ser sellos de certificación(comercio justo y Amigable con los pájaros) y métodos de procesamiento especiales. Nahum está casado y tiene una hija de 2 años de edad, El sueña con poder proporcionar todo lo necesario para que su familia tenga vida digna, además desea que su hija pueda tener una educación que le brinde mejores oportunidades en la vida.
La producción de café bajo sellos de certificación es una novedad en el rubro del café ya que hace el cultivo más sostenible porque: Ayuda a obtener mejores precios por el café y hace el cultivo amigable con el ambiente, es por esta razón que Nahum quiere certificar sus cafetales con el sello de certificación orgánico, la producción orgánica garantiza un mercado especial para el café además de colaborar con el cuido de la rica biodiversidad de la zona. 
En este momento Nahum está solicitando un crédito para poder llevar a cabo las labores de certificación, con las ganancias obtenidas por su café orgánico vendido en mercados especiales por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socio la espera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y hacer un pequeño ahorro para la educación de su hija.
Un crédito ayudara a Nahum a obtener mejores mercados para su café y a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia así como también a prepararse para poder brindarle una buena educación a su hija.
texts.en:
Nahum is a 30-year old farmer who has been producing value-added coffee for 10 years -- "value added" means with certifications, like fair trade and bird-friendly, and special processing methods.

Nahum is married and has a 2-year-old daughter. He dreams of providing everything necessary to his family so his family can live with dignity; he also hopes that his daughter can have an education that will offer her better opportunities in life.

Producing coffee with certification is a novelty in the coffee business as it provides a more sustainable crop; it also helps generate better coffee prices and makes the crop environmentally friendly, which is why Nahum wants to certify his coffee crops with organic certification. Organic production guarantees a special market for coffee and it also allows him to collaborate with helping to take care of the rich biodiversity in the area.

At this moment, Nahum is requesting a loan to accomplish his certification work. With the income he generates from his organic coffee sold in special markets via COCAFCAL, of which he is an associate, he hopes to improve his family's quality of life and save up for his daughter's education.

loans.use: buy organic manure, organic pesticides and insecticides, and organic coffee plants to convert his coffee crops into organic ones.

loans.name: Natalina

texts.en:
A $1000.00 is offered to Natalia to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy rice every day. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2010. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Natalia independent because she can be responsible for herself and also helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy rice for sale

loans.name: Expedita

texts.en:
Expedita is 62 years old and has six children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Expedita is in the agricultural business, pig-fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Expedita has been in pig-fattening for five years now and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Expedita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es:
Cándida es una pequeña productora de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Se dedica principalmente a la caficultura, con lo cual ha sacado adelante a sus 2 hijos de 4 años y 3 meses el menor. Desde hace 5 años Cándida está a cargo de su pequeña finca de 5.6 hectáreas, la cual ha venido mejorando y en la que cuenta con 4.2 hectáreas de café que produce bajo los criterios de certificación comercio justo.

El mayor desafío que ha enfrentado en la producción de café, es la presencia de plagas y enfermedades, lo cual está segura logrará mantener bajo control con un plan de fertilización adecuado. Por tal razón, está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que le permitirá darle un adecuado mantenimiento a sus plantaciones.

Su meta es continuar mejorando su finca bajo un plan de manejo integrado que le permita continuar invirtiendo gradualmente en el desarrollo y diversificación de su finca, lo cual está segura logrará con una buena toma de decisiones y su dedicación al trabajo para poder seguir sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Cándida is a small coffee producer in northern Nicaragua. Growing coffee is her main business, and it allows her to provide for her two children, a four-year-old and a three-month-old baby. For the past five years, Cándida has been in charge of her small farm. She has 13.8 acres of land, which she has been improving over time. She is currently using 10.3 acres to grow coffee, and her business complies with all fair-trade certification requirements. 

The main challenge she has faced in her business is the presence of pests and diseases on her coffee plants, but she is sure that she will be able to keep them under control with an appropriate fertilizing plan. This is the reason why she is requesting financing. She will use it to buy the supplies and fertilizer she needs to properly maintain her plantation. 

Her goal is to continue improving her farm through an integrated management plan that will allow her to continue to gradually invest in developing and diversifying her business. She is confident that she will be able to achieve this by using her good decision-making skills and dedication to her work in order to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Ingrid Yamileth

texts.es:
Ingrid es una joven humilde de 19 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios del hogar desde que era una niña, actualmente ella está estudiando 2° año de bachillerato contador, estudia los fines de semana ya que tiene que trabajar de lunes a viernes para poder ayudar a su familia con los gastos del hogar y pagar sus estudios, ella está acompañada desde hace 3 meses y su pareja se dedica a trabajar como agricultor y jornalero, en su casa solo viven ellos dos porque aún no tienen hijos 

Ingrid se dedica a los oficios domésticos desde que era una niña, decidió trabajar antes que estudiar ya que proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos, los oficios los aprendió de su madre y el lugar donde trabaja le queda cerca.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar abono y veneno para aplicarlo a la cosecha de maíz que hace con su pareja.

Ella sueña con tener ya su primer hijo y en un futuro ampliar su casa para vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Ingrid is a humble nineteen-year-old young woman. She has been doing housework ever since she was little. Her family didn't have a lot of financial resources, so she decided to work instead of going to school. She learned domestic work from her mother and works near her home. However, she is currently also studying accounting: she is in her second year. She studies on weekends because she has to work Monday through Friday in order to help her family cover their household expenses and pay for school. She moved in with her boyfriend three months ago. He works as a laborer, and only the two of them live together, because they don't have any children yet.

She and her boyfriend are also growing corn, and she needs this loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for their crops.

She is looking forward to having a child and to renovate her home one day in order to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her corn crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase floor tiles, cement and sand to replace the floor of her home.

loans.name: Jean Ladylee

texts.es: JEAN LADYLEE: Es una joven cordial, trabajadora de 26 años de edad. Está casada, con 2 hijos menores de edad. Ella trabaja como cajera. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal como cadete de un taxi. Con el propósito de tener un lugar digno y seguro donde vivir, está solicitando su segundo financiamiento para iniciar la construcción de un anexo que será utilizado como cuarto para sus hijos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Con el primer crédito otorgado por PANA PANA y financiado por KIVA, le permitieron comprar  los materiales de construcción.  Ella y su marido sueñan con establecer una tienda de ropa nueva y calzados.
texts.en:
Jean Ladylee is a friendly and hard-working young woman. She is 26 years old, is married, and has two young children. She works as a cashier, and her husband works informally as a taxi driver. 

In order to have a decent and safe place to live, she is requesting her second loan to start the construction of an addition, which will be used as a room for her children, and to cover the labour costs.

With her first loan, granted by PANA PANA and funded by KIVA, she was able to buy the building materials. 

She and her husband dream of setting up a store, where they will sell new clothing and footwear.

loans.use: to start the construction of an addition, which will be used as a room for her children, and to cover the labour costs.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Maximo es un hombre de 32 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos varones de 6 y 12 años y una hija de 8 años, y su negocio es la agricultura.
Él es buen padre, fuerte, luchador, decidido, paciente, generoso, responsable y muy trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la localidad ‘Sacaba’ un área beneficiada por la belleza natural del valle, posee características que cautivan por su clima y atractivos turísticos. Situada a 13 kilómetros de la ciudad, a una altura que varía entre los 2600 y 4500 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Máximo es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la agricultura, viven en una casa construida de adobe, ladrillo y cemento que se encuentra sin finalizar y cuentan con el servicio de energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba. Su trabajo es la agricultura, él se encarga de trabajar la tierra y sembrar frutas y hortalizas de temporada. La zona que habita es un área rural cercana a la ciudad, los lugareños extraían agua de pozos o la recogían del río, actualmente las aguas del río está contaminadas, “al fin llegó el agua potable a nuestra zona, necesitamos de su ayuda para realizar la conexión en mi hogar…” comenta. La ventaja de su vivienda es que se encuentra cercana a las recientes conexiones de agua, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para concluir su conexión de agua potable. Su sueño es terminar de construir su casa. Él desea realizar la conexión de agua potable para su baño, cocina y lavandería; y dejar de usar agua de pozo, para brindarle a su familia agua saludable. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que está construyendo su casa.
Es por esos motivos que Maximo solicita un préstamo para la conexión de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para que sus hijos crezcan sanos y fuertes.
texts.en:
Máximo is a 32 year old man who lives with his partner, has two male children 6 and 12 years old, and an 8 year old daughter. His business is agriculture. He is a good father, strong, a fighter, decisive, patient, generous, responsible and a very hard worker. 

He works in an area called "Sacaba," which benefits from the natural beauty of the valley and has captivating characteristics such as its climate and tourist attractions. It is situated 13 kilometers from the city at an altitude that varies between 2600 and 4500 meters above sea level. 

Máximo has a dark complexion, brown eyes, short black hair, short stature, and medium build. His mother tongue is Quechua, which he speaks at home, and speaks Spanish with the general public and in his work. 

He and his partner both make their living in agriculture. They live in a house made of adobe, bricks and cement which has not yet been finished. They have electric power, and well water collected by pump. 

His work is agriculture, and his job is to work the land and plant fruits and seasonal vegetables. The area where he lives is a rural area near the city, and the locals draw water from wells or collect it from the river. Currently the river water is contaminated. "Finally potable water has arrived in our area, we need your help to make the connection in my home..." he commented.
