As she does not have enough money to pay for it herself, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to be able to buy the material she needs and to pay labor costs.  This material consists of sand, cement and stones.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and stones for home improvement.

loans.name: Libania

texts.en:
Libania has built her house but she doesn't have enough money to buy more materials to complete it, so she had the idea to request a loan of $1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin for this purpose. 

Therefore she is taking out this loan because she wants to buy more materials such as stone, sand, cement, iron, ceramics, nails, etc. 

She is very happy with the loan that is offered from Tuba Rai Metin because she can use it to complete her house.

loans.use: To buy stone, sand, cement, iron, ceramics, nails and other materials.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fishing net and other fishing supplies. She has been in this business for 7 years now.

In the future, Lilia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net and other fishing supplies

loans.name: Danis Rafael

texts.es:
El señor Danis Rafael de 32  años de edad es casado, tiene dos hijos  que dependen de él, sus hijos tiene edades de 07 y 05 años, vive en una comunidad de  Choluteca, al sur de Honduras  y se dedica desde hace 06  años  a la venta de dulces y galletas por mayor y al detalle.
Don Danis Rafael le distribuye a las  pulperías y personas que se dedican a este tipo de negocio y en la época de escolar sus clientes son las escuelas y centros básicos es una persona trabajadora que se levanta temprano a vender sus productos en su motocicleta ahora ya compro su carro y esta prosperando.
Don Danis Rafael está solicitando el préstamo para la comprar llantas y reparar un poco su carro también comprara dulces con el apoyo del crédito espera mejorar su negocio y su calidad de vida. Su sueño es tener su propia casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2015.
texts.en:
Danis Rafael, 32, is married and has two children who are aged seven and five. They live in Choluteca, in the south of Honduras. He has been selling candy and cookies wholesale and to the public for six years. 

He supplies the grocery stores and other people who sell this type of product. When the schools are open he also supplies them. 

He is a hard-working person who gets up early to sell his products on his motorcycle. He recently bought a car and is now making profits. 

He is asking for a loan to buy tires and to make a few repairs to his car. He would also buy candy for his business. 

He hopes that with the help of this loan, he will improve his business and his way of life. He dreams of having his own home.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle and candy for his store.

loans.name: Aine

texts.en:
Aine is 24 years old, married and has one child who is in school.

She is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Aine requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Aine has been farming rice for 10 years now and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Aine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 62 years old and married with three children.

Norma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Norma has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from videoke machine rental.

Norma aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is applying for a loan of $800 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She has a shop selling second hand clothes and she also sells in the center of the market. She started to do this business in 2008 with her own working capital of $500. Alice is earning a good income from selling her second hand clothes because many people like to buy them, they are cheap and unique compared to new clothes. Alice also cultivates animals like cows, pigs and dogs.

loans.use: To buy trousers, shorts, shirts, turtleneck shirts and other clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sherlyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Sherlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell pottery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a butcher shop. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional pottery products to sell in her stall for her buy-and-sell pottery business.

Sherlyn has already taken out 1 loan from NWTF in the past, and this helped her to sustain her business activities. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional pottery products to sell in her stall

loans.name: Vitalina

texts.en:
Vitalina is a 51-year-old married woman with four children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

She has a basket weaving business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more raw materials for her business. She has been in this business for 5 years. 

Vitalina would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a 58-year-old married woman with five children, and she is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

She has a food production and vending business in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. She has been in this business for 10 years.
 
Editha would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ma. Josephine

texts.en: Ma. Josephine is driven by her passion for rice trading. At the age of 55, married and from Ozamis City, she runs a sari-sari store and a rice trading business that primarily supports her family's needs. Every day she never gets tired of delivering rice grains to rice retailers. Ma. Josephine is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She religiously paid her obligations without record of default. Now, she has borrowed another loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional rice and rice grains for her trading business. Having enough inventories means income opportunities. In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase rice and rice grains for trading.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a 28-year-old single woman with two children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Florence has a buy-and-sell business of personal collection products in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more personal collection products to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 7 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase more personal collection products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Redediosa

texts.en:
As a married parent of 11 children, Redediosa works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from dried fish making. 

Redediosa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 33 loans from NWTF. She is now borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase fishing net, gasoline, wood, etc. for her fishing business.

Redediosa hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net, gasoline, wood, etc. needed for her fishing business

loans.name: Ethel

texts.en:
Ethel is married with one child. She works hard to support her family. For the past four years, Ethel has had a motorcycle transportation business in the Philippines.

Ethel has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts and other materials for her business. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts and other materials

loans.name: Glenn

texts.en:
Glenn is a 38-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Glenn has a motorcycle repair shop business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials and tools for her business. She has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Glenn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and tools for her business

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a 45-year-old married woman with six children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Gemma has a food production and vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. She has been in this business for 6 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Santina

texts.en: Santina lives in Ermera and most of her daily income is from her husband's welding workshop. Her husband is a welder. She is now applying for a loan of $1,000. She will use the loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy other materials for her husband to do his activities such as angle steel, carbide welding, transformers, drilling machines and other materials to use. She started to do this business in 2014 with her own working capital of $700.  She is happy with the loan that was offered to her, because she can improve her business.

loans.use: To buy angle steel, carbide welding, transformer, drilling machines and other materials to use.

loans.name: Rozita

texts.en:
Rozita is married and has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. With the US$1,000 loan that she is being offered to improve her business, she will buy bananas and other fruit to sell. 

Rozita has been involving herself in business activities since 2010. She feels very comfortable in running her business because she can earn money every day. Running a business has made Rozita independent because she can be responsible for herself and can also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy bananas and other fruit to sell

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora, aged 39, is married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. Nora has been running a general store in the Philippines for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Nora has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has now requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store. 

Nora aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Ervira

texts.en:
Ervira has been involved in business activities since 2015. She started her business with her own working capital of US$700. Ervira sells traditional items that she buys from local people, then resells at the market. She is happy to do this because it's become her business activity. 

Ervira is now requesting a loan of US$1,500 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to buy more traditional items to sell. She is happy because, with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she can expand her business in the future, and her income can increase.

loans.use: To buy traditional items to sell

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net.

Rosita has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Rosita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bundle of fishing net

loans.name: Santina

texts.en: Santina did not have the chance to finish her education but she is hopeful that she will graduate from the university and have more opportunities in life. And she is happy with this loan because it will help her to graduate from her school.

loans.use: to graduate from the university.

loans.name: Necie

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Necie works hard to support her family.

She has a butcher shop business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store and buying and selling vegetables. Necie is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional meat and fish to sell in her stall.

Necie has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional meat and fish to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en:
Saturnina works hard to support her family. Saturnina is married and has a business raising livestock in the Philippines.

Saturnina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Saturnina has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Saturnina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita works hard to support her family. She is married with seven children and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

Perlita requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell.

Perlita has been in this business for 10 years now, and earns additional income from her general store.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Luz works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Luz is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials for the maintenance of her fishing business.

Luz has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for the maintenance of her business

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Analiza is 39 years old and has three children who are in school.

Analiza has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, etc. for her food production business.

Analiza has been in this business for five years. In the future, Analiza would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, and vegetables for her food production business.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en: Filomena is applying for a loan of $600 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She has a shop of second hand clothes and her shop is in center of the market. She started to do this business in 2010 with her own working capital of $200. Filomena is earning a good income from selling her second hand clothes because many people like to buy them, they are cheap and unique. She is very busy, but she said this has become her duty.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing, long sleeves, short sleeves, shirts and other clothes to sell.

loans.name: Reyalyn

texts.en:
Reyalyn is a married woman, 37 years old with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Reyalyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her stall.

Reyalyn has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina is 36 years old and has three children. She is married and all of her children are in school.

Rina is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rina has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Rina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.en: A loan of $ 1,000 will help Tomas to send his children to primary  school. He hopes that by continuing his children’s education, they will have more opportunities and a better life. The money will be used to cover educational costs including tuition, books, and school supplies.

loans.use: to buy tuition, books, and school supplies.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 43 years old and married with seven children.

Letecia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Letecia has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Letecia aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro de 51 años de edad, estudió hasta el tercer año de ingeniería civil en la universidad, está casado y su esposa se dedica a la venta de ropa para todas las edades en la comunidad, de él dependen su esposa y sus dos hijos menores de edad.
Ramiro aprendió a trabajar en la albañilería hace 31 años cuando unos amigos y su tío le enseñaron, él trabaja de lunes a sábado en diferentes proyectos de construcción, además se dedica a la siembra de maíz y de frijoles para tener así el alimento básico en la familia, él siembra media hectárea de maíz y tres de frijoles en una comunidad cercana.

Él necesita este crédito para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde cultiva, además comprará abono para los cultivos, también comprará ropa para damas, caballeros y niños para el negocio de su esposa.
Él sueña con construir su propia vivienda, seguir con los proyectos de albañil, apoyar a su esposa en su negocio y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ramiro is 51 years old and completed up to the end of third year of a university degree in civil engineering. Ramiro is married; his wife has a business selling clothes for people of all ages. Ramiro's wife and two children depend on Ramiro.

Ramiro learned the building trade 31 years from his uncle and some friends. Ramiro works from Monday to Saturday on different building projects. He also works growing corn and beans so as to feed his family. Ramiro has half a hectare of corn crops, and three hectares of bean crops, in a nearby community.

He needs this loan in order to pay rent on land for crops, and to to buy manure for crops; Ramiro will also buy men's women's and children's clothing for his wife's business.

Ramiro's dreams are to build his own house, continue with his building projects, to support his wife with her business, and to give his children the best he can in life.

loans.use: to pay rent on land for crops, and to to buy manure for crops; Ramiro will also buy men's women's and children's clothing for his wife's business.

loans.name: Leonel Jose

texts.es:
José un señor con 68 años de edad, se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos de levante, es una actividad aprendida empíricamente, trabaja 2 días a la semana 5 horas cada uno. 

Este hombre trabajador y soñador, desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad, busca un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Tiene la ilusión de que junto con interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva podrá lograr lo anhelado.

Apoya a este empresario con deseos de crecer, haz un préstamo.
texts.en:
José is 68 years old and makes a living raising and selling pigs, a trade he learned empirically. José works two days per week at this job, five hours per day.

José is hard-working and a dreamer. He wants to have a large pig farm. José is applying for a loan in order to buy young pigs to raise, breed and sell.

José believes that, with Interactuar and those at Kiva, he will be able to achieve his goals.

Support this businessman and his dreams of expanding his business by donating a loan.

loans.use: to buy young pigs to raise, breed and sell.

loans.name: Wumiisyo Museo Women Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is 43-year-old Rodah. She is  married and has five children, two attend school. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014 to benefit from the trainings such as enterprise development. 

She has a poultry farm and is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy more chickens to increase  production and increase her income. This will enable her pay for food and clothing for her family.

Rodah is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Abdurasul

texts.ru: Абдурасулу 43 лет.  Он живет со своей семьей в городе Исфаре. Абдурасул очень добрый и  трудолюбивый человек. Занимается растениеводством. Он всегда помогает своим родственникам. Абдурасул хочет оказать помощь дочери своей сестре. Его племянница лежит в гастроэнтерологической больнице и ей срочно нужны деньги на лечение и лекарства. К сожалению, у его сестры нет средств, и Абдурасул решил обратиться за кредитом. У него очень большая надежда на то что, ему не откажут и его племянница в скором времени поправится.
texts.en:
Abdurasul is 43 years old. He lives with his family in Isfara city. Abdurasul is a very kind and hardworking person. He cultivates crops. He always helps his relatives. 

Abdurasul wants to extend help to his sister's daughter. His niece is in a gastroenterology hospital and she urgently needs money for medical treatment and medicines. Unfortunately, his sister does not have the funds, and Abdurasul has decided to apply for a loan. 

He hopes dearly that his application for a loan will not be rejected, and that his niece will get better soon.

loans.use: to pay for treatment and medicines.

loans.name: Cherrylyn

texts.en:
Cherrylyn is 39 years old and is married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

Cherrylyn has been running a general store in the Philippines for five years and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
A sus 18 años de edad Alejandra, luego de quedarse sin empleo, por necesidad económica inicio a trabajar vendiendo mercancía desde su casa, así logra generar los ingresos mínimos para el sustento de su hijo menor.

Actualmente Alejandra se encuentra con una gran cantidad de pedidos, pero debido a que no cuenta con un buen capital, solicita un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el fin de comprar mercancía como jeans y blusas, espera mejorar sus ventas y generar más ganancias.

Con estos ingresos ella cumplirá el sueño de comprase una vivienda propia y pagarle la educación a su hijo, pues es el motivo de ella seguir luchando.

Usted puede hacer parte de este sueño, preste hoy.
texts.en:
At 18 years old, Alejandra was left with no job and so decided to start working selling merchandise from her own home. She thus managed to earn an income in order to support her young son.

Alejandra now has a large number of orders but, owing to a lack of capital, she is applying for a loan from Interactuar so that she can buy merchandise, such as jeans and blouses. She hopes that this will allow her to increase sales and earn higher profits.

With these profits, Alejandra will achieve her dream of buying her own house and paying for her son's education, her motivation to continue working hard.

You can be a part of this dream - make a loan today.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as jeans and blouses. She hopes that this will allow her to increase sales and earn higher profits.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: A loan of $1,000 is offered to Maria to repair her house. Maria started construction of her house but she was not able to finish it because of a lack of money to buy materials such as cement, stone, sand, and other items. Now she is requesting a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to help her finish her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand, and other items for her house.

loans.name: Rayhongul

texts.ru:
На фотографии видите Райхонгул. Видно, что она бизнес-леди. Райхонгул 15 лет, продвигает   торговую деятельность. Она на рынке продает помидоры и огурцы. Раньше она продавала фрукты.  Сейчас сезон помидоры и огурцы, и она решила продавать овощи. Райхонгул выбрала деятельность отца, и до сегодняшнего дня идет по его стопам. 
Райхонгулу 44 года. Она замужем и имеет детей. Дети учатся в средней школе, и после школе они помогает маме в работе. Ее дети воспитанные и заботливые как Райхонгул. У Райхонгул есть  только одна деятельность и один источник доход, который кормить их. Райхонгул просит кредит для расширения деятельность, и за счет кредита она хочет перевозить арбуз и другие овощи на продажу. Райхонгул ждет Вашу доброту!
texts.en:
The person in the photograph is Rayhongul. It is evident that she is a business lady. Rayholgul has been working at her retail business for 15 years. She sells tomatoes and cucumbers at the market. Before, she sold fruits. Now is the season for tomatoes and cucumbers, so she has decided to sell vegetables. Rayhongul chose her father's business, and until today is following in his footsteps. 

Rayhongul is 44 years old. She is married and has children. Her children are attending middle school, and after school they help their mother with her work. Her children are well-mannered and caring, like Rayhongul. Rayhongul has only one business and one source of income which provides for them. 

Rayhongul requests a loan in order to expand her business, and with the funds from the loan she wants to transport watermelon and other vegetables for sale. Rayhongul is waiting for your kindness!

loans.use: to expand her business and transport watermelons and vegetables.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is 31 years old, married, and has four children, two of whom are currently in school.

Antonieta is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has been raising livestock for one year now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She has now requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

In the future, Antonieta would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Isaura

texts.en:
Isaura is requesting a loan of $1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. 

She sells gasoline because she earns a good income from this business, and she lives near the main road and every day many people come to buy her gasoline, so she still happy to do her business. She is taking this loan because she wants to buy more gasoline. Isaura has been involved in business activities for a few years, and started with her own working capital of $500.

When Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan to her, she said that with this loan she can manage her business better.

loans.use: to buy gasoline.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 28 years, and earns more income from buying and selling fish.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials like fishing nets, gasoline, bamboo, etc for her fishing business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fishing nets, gasoline, bamboo, etc.

loans.name: Marigen

texts.en:
Marigen is 41 years old and is married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Marigen runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been running the general store for two years, and also earns an income from selling food.  She has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan.  Marigen has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

Marigen aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a 35-year-old married woman with four children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Leonora has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years. Leonora requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

In the future, Leonora would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita is a 63-year-old married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Marita has a business buying and selling nipa roofing in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more nipa roofing to sell.

Marita has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more nipa roofing to sell.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is widowed and has a business raising livestock in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 25 years now, and works hard to support her family. 

Emelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

In the future, Emelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en:
Madalena is taking a loan of $1,0000 to improve her business. 

She is married and runs a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store, such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, coffee, salt and bread. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600.

Madalena is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, coffee, salt and bread.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 40 years old, and is single with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Mary Grace runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, etc.

She has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from selling food and buying and selling animal feed.

Mary Grace aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, etc.

loans.name: Emerenciana

texts.en:
Emerenciana is a 52-year-old married woman with three children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Emerenciana has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years. Emerenciana requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Abdurahmonkhuja

texts.ru: Этого молодого человека зовут Абдурахмонхуча. Он не женат,  живет со своей матерю и сестрой.  Ему всего 24 лет, но, несмотря на юный возраст, он добился много успехов. Абдурахмонхуча очень старательный юноша. После окончания средней школы у его матери не было финансовых средств на его поступление в Университет, и Абдурахмонхуча решил, что сам будет обеспечивать свою семью любым способом. Он открыл свой бизнес и занялся продажей женских плащей и пальто. В этом деле ему помогли его тётя и мать. Абдурахмонхуча говорит, что благодаря благословению его матери и поддержке любимой тёти, он стал успешным бизнесменом. Сейчас он намерен закупить новую партию женских пальто и плащей от известных брендов и расширить свой бизнес. У него есть свой капитал, однако этого недостаточно. По этой причине Абдурахмонхуча обратился за кредитом, надеясь, что Вы ему поможете.
texts.en:
This young person is Abdurahmonkhuja. He is unmarried, and lives with his mother and sister. He is only 24 years old, however in spite of his young age, he has achieved many successes. 

Abdurahmonkhuja is a very diligent young man. After graduating secondary school, his mother did not have enough money for his university education, thus Abdurahmonkhuja decided to provide for his family by whatever means. He opened his business and sold women's raincoats and coats. His aunt and mother help him with this business. 

Abdurahmonkhuja says that thanks to the blessing of his mother and the support of his beloved aunt, he has become a successful businessman. Now he intends to buy a new lot of women's coats and raincoats from a famous brand, and expand his business. He has his capital, however it is not sufficient. For this reason, Abdurahmonkhuja has applied for a loan, and is hoping that you will help him.

loans.use: to purchase a new lot of women's coats and raincoats.

loans.name: Sharifkhon

texts.ru: Шарифхону из Хамадони 35 лет. Он женат и отец четырех несовершеннолетних детей. Шарифхон очень весёлый и общительный человек. Шарифхон очень любит свою семью и старается быть лучшим папой для своих детей. Он всегда найдет время на воспитание своих детей. У Шарифхона нет высшего образования, и он прилагает все усилия, чтобы его дети получили хорошее образование. Шарифхон занимается куплей и продажей скота. У него есть хороший опыт в этой сфере. Его жена всегда помогает ему, и они обеспечивают родных и близких молочными продуктами. Шарифхон хочет, увеличит доход семьи,  и расширить свой бизнес. Он хочет закупить несколько голов телят, откормить их и продать с наценкой. К сожалению, для этого у него нет достаточно денег, поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Шарифхон верит и заранее благодарит Вас за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sharifkhon is from Hamadoni. He is 35 years old. He is married and has three young children. Sharifkhon is a very cheerful and sociable person. Sharifkhon loves his family very much and tries to be the best father for his children. He always finds the time to look after his children. 

Sharifkhon does not have higher education, and he makes all effort to ensure that his children receive a better education. Sharifkhon buys and sells cattle. He has good experience in this field. His wife always helps him, and they provide their family and close friends with milk products. 

Sharifkhon wants to augment his family's income, and expand his business. He wants to buy some calves, fatten them up, and sell them for profit. Unfortunately, he does not have enough money for this, thus he has applied for a loan. Sharifkhon believes in you and thanks you in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of calves.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Эту молодую и талантливую девушку зовут Замира. Ей 20 лет и она не замужем. Замира живет с родителями в районе Хамадони. Её мама учительница, а отец пенсионер. Раньше её мать после работы занималась шитьем национальных платьев. С годами в силу возраста ей стало тяжело шить. Когда Замира окончила школу, родители не смогли дать ей высшего образования, так как их семейного дохода было очень мало. Её мама решила научить дочку самостоятельно зарабатывать себе на жизнь и помогать родителям. Замире понравилась это работа, и шитье стало для неё не только работой и ее хобби тоже. Она стала успешной портнихой. Для расширения своего бизнеса Замире необходимо закупить новую швейную машинку для вышивки платьев, но у неё не хватает средств. Она надеется на Вашу доброту и великодушие.
texts.en:
This young and talented woman is Zamira. She is 20 years old and unmarried. Zamira lives with her parents in Hamadoni district. Her mother is a schoolteacher, and her father is retired. 

Before, her mother sewed national women's dresses after work. Over the years, due to age, it became hard for her to sew. When Zamira finished school, her parents could not pay for her higher education, since their family income was very small. 

Her mother decided to teach Zamira to independently earn her own living and help her parents. Zamira liked this work, and sewing became her only job as well as her hobby. She became a successful seamstress. 

In order to expand her business, Zamira must buy a new sewing machine for embroidering dresses, however she does not have enough funds. She is relying on your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: to purchase an embroidery sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, salt, coffee, and other products to improve her business.

loans.name: Firuz

texts.ru: Молодому энергичному парню по имени Фируз всего 18 лет. Он женат, имеет двух братьев и одну сестренку. Живет дружная семья в селе Кунгурт, района Темурмалик. К сожалению не имея средств на обучения, Фируз не смог поступить в Высшие образовательные учреждения. К тому же младшие братья и сестренка находятся на попечении у Фируза. В родном селе он открыл магазин и продает там продукты питания. Само здание магазина нуждается в капитальном ремонте. С этой целью он обратился за кредитом. Фируз с надеждой обращается к Вам и верит в то, что Вы сможете помочь ему сделать ремонт, расширить бизнес и закупить новые продукты питания.
texts.en:
This young and energetic guy is Firuz and he is only 18 years old. He is married and has two brothers and one sister. He lives with his amicable family in Kungurt vilage in the Temurmalik area. 

Unfortunately lacking the funds for education, Firuz was not able to enroll in higher education. Moreover, Firuz's younger brothers and sister are in his care. In his native village he opened a shop and sells food products there. The shop building needs capital for renovations. 

With this aim, he has applied for a loan. Firuz turns to you with hope and believes that you will be able to help him to do renovations, expand his business, and buy new food products.

loans.use: to do renovations, expand his business, and buy new food products.

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура, 58 лет, вдова, воспитала 5 детей. У Мастуры - среднее образование, сейчас на пенсии, также в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 коровы, 10 овец. На 1,0 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу и клевер. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, дети Мастуры помогают ей материально. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства и улучшения материального благосостояния семьи, Мастура обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Мастура планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и материального благосостояния семьи.
texts.en:
Mastura is 58 years old, widowed, and has raised five children. Mastura has secondary education, and is now retired, and also works in animal and field husbandry in order to provide income for her family. Thanks to her hard work, today on her farm there are four cows and ten sheep. On 1.0 hectare of land she cultivates corn and clover. 

The monthly combined income is about 20,000 som (KGS), which is not sufficient for a respectable life. Mastura's children help her financially. In order to further develop her farm and improve the financial standing of her family, Mastura has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 som (KGS) in order to buy cows for fattening up and subsequent selling at the market for a higher price. 

Mastura plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further increase of the number of cattle, and the material welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria está casada y tiene un hijo, por ellos está luchando para poder serles un ejemplo y ayudar a su marido.
Ella sueña con ser una profesional que ayude a las demás personas por medio de su profesión el cual es la de Enfermería.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar los gastos de titulación para que de esa forma pueda cubrir ese gasto que tiene. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer.
texts.en:
Gregoria is married and has one child. For these reasons, she is striving to be an example and also help her husband. Her dream is to become a professional who helps other people. This is why she has chosen nursing as her profession.

Gregoria is requesting this loan so that she can pay her degree expenses that need to be covered since they are outstanding. She appreciates the opportunity she has received so that she can grow.

loans.use: to pay her degree expenses.

loans.name: Ibadat

texts.ru: Ибадат, 57 лет, в разводе, есть сын. Ибадат занимается животноводством на протяжении 30 лет. У нее в хозяйстве есть 100 овец. Ибадат получает ежемесячную прибыль в размере примерно 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития ее бизнеса, она решила обратиться в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров для увеличения объемов удоя и реализации экологически-чистого молока. Свои доходы Ибадат будет вкладывать в бизнес и постройку жилого дома.
texts.en:
Ibadat is 57 years old, divorced, and has a son. Ibadat has worked in animal husbandry for 30 years. Her farm has 100 sheep. Ibadat receives a monthly profit of about 10,000 som (KGS). 

In order to further develop her business, she decided to apply to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) in order to buy two dairy cows to increase the volume of organic milk sales. Ibadat will invest her income in her business and building a residential home.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to increase the volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: German Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo un hombre de 27 años de edad, soltero y padre de un menor con 5 años de edad, se dedica a la fabricación de baldosas y bloques, un negocio por el que ha logrado salir a delante y darle lo necesario a su hijo.

Con el propósito de aumentar sus clientes y generar más ganancias Guillermo solicita un préstamo con el que comprara cemento y arena, así su producción será más efectiva.

El deseo de este hombre trabador y humilde es el de pagarle la educación a su hijo, pues su bienestar es prioridad.

Apoya al sueño de este empresario, haz un préstamo.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a 27-year-old single man who is the father of a 5-year-old.  He makes a living producing floor tiles and blocks.  His business has allowed him to get ahead and provide for his son.  

Guillermo wants to increase his customers and generate more profit, so he is requesting a loan to buy cement and sand to make his production more effective.  

This hard-working and humble man's wish is to pay for his child's eduction, since his wellbeing is his priority.  

Please support this businessman's dream with a loan.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to make his production more effective

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos un hombre de 28 años de edad, trabajador y humilde que se dedica a realizar trabajos de mecánica, en un taller que inicio hace poco, un medio por el cual ha logrado salir adelante con su familia conformada por una hija menor y su actual pareja.
Trabaja 7 días, 10 horas diarias.

Carlos, con la idea de aumentar sus clientes y generar más ganancias, solicita un préstamo con el cual comprara herramientas como juegos de copas, juegos de llaves, torque, extractor, compresor, prensa hidráulica entre otros.

Para Carlos no hay nada imposible, su sueño es seguir trabajando, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y en un futuro dejarle el negocio a sus hijos.

Aporta al sueño de este hombre, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Carlos is a hard-working and humble 28-year-old man who works as a mechanic in a workshop that he established a short while ago.  His business has allowed him to move his family (his partner and a young daughter) forwards.  He works 10 hours a day, 7 days a week.  

Carlos wants to increase his customers and generate more profit, so he is requesting a loan to buy tools such as socket sets, wrench sets, a torque wrench, an extractor, a compressor, and a hydraulic press, among other tools.  

To Carlos, nothing is impossible.  His dream is to continue working and to improve the condition of his home, and in the future to leave his business to his children.  

Please support this man's dream with a loan.

loans.use: to buy tools such as socket sets, wrench sets, a torque wrench, an extractor, a compressor, and a hydraulic press, among other tools.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.en:
Melissa is 45 years old and married with three children.

She is in agribusiness, pig fattening in the Philippines. Melissa is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy sacks of feed, vaccines, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her pig.

Melissa has been in this business for three years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed, vaccines, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Dixiana Nohemi

texts.es:
La Señora Dixiana de 25 años de edad es casada y vive con su esposo en su casa de habitación, ubicada en un barrio de la Ciudad de Nacaome Valle, se dedica  al transporte de moto taxi desde hace un año y medio cuenta con 1 moto taxi en el cual su esposo transporta persona diariamente de todos los barrio de la ciudad de Nacaome.
Dixiana también es enfermera del Centro de salud de Nacaome es una persona muy luchadora, con deseos de salir adelante cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que diariamente trabaja en este medio de transporte y atiende a sus clientes. 
Dixiana Solicita el préstamo  para realizarle chequeo de oberjol y la compra de un poste del timón ya que este presenta problemas al girar y con el apoyo de este crédito espera tener en buen estado la  unidad y tener mejores ingresos.
Su sueño es  comprarse una nueva moto taxi.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Junio del  2015.
texts.en:
Dixiana, 25 years old, is married and lives with her husband in their house located in a neighborhood in the city of Nacaome Valley. She has been dedicated to providing mototaxi transportation service for a year and a half. She has one mototaxi in which her husband transports people daily from all of the neighborhoods of Nacaome.

Dixiana is also a nurse at the Nacaome Health Center. She is a very hard working person with wishes to succeed. She has the support of her husband who works daily in this means of transportation and attending to their customers.

Dixiana is requesting the loan to perform an overhaul check and to buy a steering column since the current one is presenting problems when turning and, with the support of this loan, she hopes to have the unit in good condition and earn better income. Her dream is to buy a new mototaxi.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June 2015

loans.use: to buy a spare steering wheel and repair her mototaxi for her business.

loans.name: Monaliza

texts.en:
Monaliza is a hardworking female entrepreneur with four children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, soap, chips, milk, sugar, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming rice.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Monaliza dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, chips, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Luz Irene

texts.es:
Irene una mujer con 25 años de edad, soltera y madre de un menor, que se dedica a ofrecer servicios de informática desde su casa y aparte tiene una pequeña tienda, lo cual le genera ingresos mínimos para cubrir sus necesidades.

A maría las ventas se le redujeron ya que no cuenta con la cantidad de dinero suficiente para surtir su negocio, por este motivo solicita un préstamo, con el fin de comprar un refrigerador y surtido de snack.

Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, pues el material con que fue hecha no está en el mejor estado.

Para lograrlo, ella cuenta con la ayuda de interactuar y los colaboradores del portal kiva.
texts.en:
Irene is a 25-year-old woman who is the single mother of a small child.  She makes a living providing computing services from her home and she also has a small store where she makes a small amount of income to cover her daily necessities.  

Irene's sales have diminished and she no longer has enough money to stock her store, so she is requesting a loan to buy a refrigerator and an assortment of snacks.  

Her dream is to improve the condition of her home, since the material that it's made of isn't in the best shape.  

She is counting on the assistance of Interactuar and Kiva collaborators to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and an assortment of snacks

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael de 46 años de edad, reside en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 8 y 3 años de edad. Rafael es un hombre trabajador que desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la venta de mariscos en los alrededores de su comunidad y junto a su esposa que realiza ventas de antojitos típicos a diario en su casa de habitación logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Rafael hace un tiempo inicio la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio pero debido a la situación económica no logro terminar la obra, es por esa razón que  solicita un crédito a FUSAI para la compra de los materiales de construcción necesarios como son: cemento, arena, lámina, puertas y ventanas con el propósito de terminar la construcción de su cuarto de habitación y brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Rafael is 46 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and two children who are 8 and 3 years old.  Rafael is a hard worker and he has made a living for a long time selling seafood around his community, as well as working with his wife selling local dishes from his home daily to cover their household expenses.

A little while ago, Rafael started construction on a bedroom, but he wasn't able to finish the project because of his economic circumstances, so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy necessary construction materials such as cement, sand, metal sheeting, doors, and windows so that he can finish building the room and provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, metal sheeting, doors, and windows in order to finish the construction of his living space.

loans.name: Matnelyn

texts.en:
Matnelyn works hard to support her family. She is married with four children and has a weaving business in the Philippines.

Matnelyn has requested a 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy materials for her business, which she has been in for five years now. She also earns additional income from food vending.

Matnelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Regie

texts.en:
Regie is 30 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them and has been running a general store in the Philippines for five years. Regie has requested a 17,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell,such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee and drinks.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store

loans.name: Blanca Leticia

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora de 41 años de edad, hace el rol de padre  y madre, criando y alimentando sus hijos solo con la ayuda de su negocio, trabaja por largas jornadas durante mucho tiempo.

Ella tiene un local comercial, de productos variados para todo tipo de personas, en el momento Blanca se encuentra con poco surtido es por esto que solicita un crédito con el cual comprara vitrinas, surtido de ropa y accesorios de hombre, mujer y niño.

Blanca quiere expandir su negocio y llegar a generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesiten, su sueño es pagarle la educación a sus hijos, y en un futuro dejarles el negocio que con esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado sacar adelante.
texts.en:
Blanca is a hard-working, hard-fighting 41-year-old woman who fills the role of father and mother, raising and feeding her children with only the help of her business.  She works long days most of the time.  

She has a commercial store with various products for all kinds of people.  At the moment, Blanca doesn't have very much in stock, so she is requesting a loan to buy display cases and an assortment of clothing and accessories for men, women, and children.  

Blanca wants to expand her business and to be able to generate employment for the people who need it most.  Her dream is to pay for her children's education, and to turn over the business to them in the future that she has put so much effort and dedication into to move them forwards.

loans.use: to buy display cases and assorted clothing and accessories for men, women, and children.

loans.name: Alejandra Maria

texts.es:
Alejandra una mujer con 28 años de edad, soltera y sin hijos, trabajadora y humilde, adquirió un buen conocimiento sobre las confecciones por medio de una clases que recibió, y hoy en día es lo que le genera ingresos, se encuentra trabajando en un taller de confecciones a terceros cerca a su casa.
Trabaja 7 días 9 horas diarios.

Ella desea abrir su primer local de confecciones, pero debido a que no cuenta con materia prima solicita un crédito con el cual comprara telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás herramientas que sean de su utilidad.


El sueño de Alejandra es mejorar las condiciones de su casa, pues su estado no es el mejor.
Aporte al sueño de esta mujer, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Alejandra, a woman who is 28 years old, is single and has no children. Hardworking and humble, she acquired good seamstress skills through a class that she took and today this is how she earns income. She is found working in a workshop close to her house. She works 7 days a week, 9 hours a day.

She wishes to open her first workshop but since she does not have raw materials she is requesting a loan with which to buy fabric, thread, buttons, closures and other tools that will be useful.

Alejandra's dream is to improve her house conditions since it is not in the best state. Support this woman's dream and make a loan.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, closures and other tools that she needs.

loans.name: Maria Betty

texts.es:
María una señora con 33 años de edad, soltera y sin hijos, dedicada desde hace poco a la venta de productos para la belleza, un negocio que monto en su propia casa.
Trabaja 7 días 10 horas cada uno 

El sueño de María, es seguir trabajando, ahorrar sus ingresos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

María desea abastecer su negocio pero debido a que no cuenta con un bien capital busca un préstamo con el cual comprara productos de belleza como tinturas, esmaltes, tratamientos, accesorios de mujer, entre otros.

Esta mujer cuenta con su ayuda, aporte a este sueño haciendo un préstamo.
texts.en:
Maria is a 33 year old woman. She is single and has no children. She has been dedicated for a short while to selling beauty products, a business she started in her own house. She works 7 days a week, 10 hours a day.

Maria's dream is to keep working, save her money and improve her living conditions.

Maria wishes to stock her business but since she does not have enough capital she has sought a loan with which she will buy beauty products like dyes, enamels, treatments, women's accessories, among other items.

This woman counts on your help. Support this dream by making a loan.

loans.use: to buy beauty products like dyes, enamels, treatments, women's accessories, among other items.

loans.name: Pascoela

texts.en: Pascoela wants to repair her house, but she does not have enough money to buy all the materials. Pascoela requested a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more building materials such as sand, stone, wood, cement, nails, zinc, iron and other materials. With the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin she can complete her house. She is very happy because she is able to get a loan.

loans.use: To buy sand, stone, wood, cement, nails, zinc, iron and other materials for house repairs.

loans.name: Melquisedec

texts.en: A loan of $800 will help Melquisedec to send his children to primary school. He hopes that by continuing his children’s education, they will have more opportunities and a better life. The money will be used to cover educational costs, including textbooks and a backpack for his youngest daughter.

loans.use: to pay for his children's educational costs

loans.name: Juan Esteban

texts.es:
Esteban un hombre campesino que monto un negocio de cría de aves, buscando ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia conformada por una hija de 5 años y sus padres.

Inicio su negocio por necesidad económica, dedicándole 9 horas diarias al galpón de pollos.
Solicita un préstamo para crecer, con el apoyo que puedan recibir comprara cuido de engorde para pollos y  pagara a proveedores.

Su sueño es el de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para así poderle ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una buena estabilidad económica.

Esteban a igual que muchos empresarios esperan de la ayuda de Interactuar y los prestadores del portal Kiva para cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Esteban is a man from the countryside who started a business raising poultry, looking for income to get ahead with his family made up of a five year old daughter and his parents.

He started his business due to economic need, dedicating 9 hours a day to the chicken shed.

He is requesting a loan to grow. With the support that he can receive, he will buy care to fatten chickens and to pay providers.

His dream is to improve his house's conditions to thus be able to offer his family a better quality of life and economic stability.

Esteban, like many entrepreneurs, hopes with the help of Interactuar and the lenders of the Kiva portal, to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy care for chickens to fatten them and to pay providers.

loans.name: Edison Andres

texts.es:
Edison un hombre con 31 años de edad, dedicado desde pequeño a realizar trabajos de campo, gracias a las enseñanza de un amigo cercano.

Actualmente se dedica a la venta de ganado, en el Carmen de Viboral, dedicándole 3 horas diarias a su trabajo. 
Pero debido a que no cuenta con un buen capital solicita un préstamo con el fin de comprar ganado de levante y cancelar saldo a un tercero que le suministra ganado.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando, para comprar su vivienda propia.
Usted puede ser parte de este sueño, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Edison, a 31 year old man, has been dedicated since he was young to farm work, thanks to the instruction of a close friend.

Currently, he is dedicated to selling cattle in Carmen de Viboral, spending 3 hours a day on this work. However, since he does not have good capital, he is requesting a loan with the goal of buying cattle to raise and to pay a debt to a third party who provided cattle.

His dream is to keep working and to buy his own house. You can be part of this dream. Make a loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pay a debt to a third party who provided cattle.

loans.name: Erose

texts.en:
Erose is 27 years old and has three children, two of whom are in school. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a 12,000 Philippines (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy items for her store, such as canned goods and personal care products.

Erose has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this one. She has been running the general store for a year and also earns an income from selling peanuts. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another one to further build her businesses. 

Erose aspires to expand her businesses to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items for her store

loans.name: Alba Nubia

texts.es:
Alba una señora con 63 años de edad, debido a que no cuenta con la ayuda de un familiar y por necesidad económica se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida desde su propia casa, con los ingresos generados logra cubrir sus necesidades.
Trabaja de jueves a domingo 4 horas diarias.

Su sueño es formalizar su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Solicita un préstamo con el fin de abastecer su negocio con alimentos, desechables y demás productos que sean de su utilidad, espera generar más ventas e incrementar sus ganancias.

Para alaba no hay nada imposible y sabe que de la mano de Interactuar y los  colaboradores del portal kiva podrá salir adelante.
texts.en:
Alba is 63 years old. Due to the fact that she doesn't have family support and out of financial necessity, she works making and selling food from her own home. With the income she generates, she is able to cover her expenses. She works Thursday through Sunday for 4 hours a day.  

Her dream is to formalize her business and improve her living conditions. 

She is taking for a loan to stock her business with food, disposable products and other products that are useful for her. She hopes to generate more sales and increase her profits.

For Alba, nothing is impossible and she knows that with a hand from Interactuar and people cooperating through the Kiva portal, she can get ahead.

loans.use: to stock her business with foods, disposable items, and other useful products.

loans.name: Maria Luz Dary

texts.es:
Maria, de 47 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella se desempeña como vendedora de mercancía en una pequeña papelería.
Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento.

Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de mercancía como útiles escolares, cosméticos, juguetes, entre otros y de este modo tener inventario disponible para vender a sus clientes.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old. What she wants from life is very clear to her and she is determined to get ahead and have a good life.  

She works selling merchandise in a small paper goods store. SHe started this activity in order to seek the resources she needs to support herself. 

She is an enterprising and very disciplined woman. She is asking for a loan to buy a wide variety of merchandise, such as school supplies, cosmetics, toys, and more, so that she can have inventory available to sell to her customers.

She has the hope to keep progressing as a businesswoman and have more stable income.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of merchandise, such as school supplies, cosmetics, toys and more.

loans.name: Adriana Patricia

texts.es:
Adriana, con 49 años de edad es soltera.
Actualmente se dedica a la venta de zapatos para dama, caballero y niños y con esto ha logrado obtener recursos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar durante los tres años que lleva realizando dicha actividad. 

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, dedicada y comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, siempre busca oportunidades que le permitan progresar, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de calzado al por mayor para aprovechar los descuentos que le realizan y ofrecer más variedad que satisfaga los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y así poder tener mejor margen de utilidad por las ventas. 

De esta manera, Adriana podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su objetivo primordial, que es ampliar su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Adriana is 49 years old. She is single. At this time, she sells shoes for women, men and children. During the three years she has been doing this activity, she has been able to obtain resources to contribute to the support of her home.  

She is an enterprising woman with vision. She is dedicated and committed to her family and her work. She is always seeking opportunities that allow her to progress. That is why she is asking for the loan in order to invest it in buying shoes wholesale to take advantage of the discounts being offered and offer a wider variety to meet the needs and tastes of her customers and have a wider profit margin from the sales. 

In this way, Adriana can advance toward achieving her main objective, which is expanding her business and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shoes wholesale to take advantage of the discounts being offered and offer a wider variety.

loans.name: Gilberto Jose

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Gilberto ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió su puesto de comidas hace 10 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos e ingredientes como harina, maíz, carne, pollo, aliños, entre otros.

Con estos ingredientes podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.

Apoya a Gilberto con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With his smile and big heart, Gilberto has been very popular in his neighborhood since he opened his food stall 10 years ago with a lot of hard work and a desire to get ahead and improve his family's living conditions.  

The loan he is asking for is to buy materials and ingredients such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, seasonings and more. 

With these ingredients, he will be able to continue cooking and preparing the delicious things that he has been making with his hands and offering and serving people. 

Support Gilberto in his business and make his life better with a loan!

loans.use: to buy materials and ingredients such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, seasonings and more.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 59 years old and widowed with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lucena has a buy-and-sell scrap materials business in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more scrap materials to sell. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lucena has been in this business for 30 years. Lucena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more scrap materials to sell.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Juliet works hard to support her family.

Juliet sells ready-to-wear clothing in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling kitchen wares. Juliet is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell at her business. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Juliet has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Julieto

texts.en:
Julieto is from Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. He is 54 years of age. He and his partner have five adult-aged kids. In 2005, he joined Paglaum MPC and he appreciates the programs and services of the co-op. From his desire to help his family, he engaged in seaweed production, which was financed by Paglaum MPC. His source of income existed for 10 years now. 

Recently, Julieto requested financial assistance from Paglaum MPC in the amount of 15,000 PHP to purchase 10 bags of cement, galvanized iron sheets and to pay his workers for repairing his house. Through this, he can provide a comfortable and decent home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of cement, galvanized iron sheets, and to pay his workers for repairing his house.

loans.name: Theresia

texts.en: Theresia has a plan to build her house, but she does not have enough money to buy materials for to repair her house. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of $1,500 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy the materials for completing her house. Theresia wants to buy more materials such as stone, sand, wood, cement, iron, nails and others to use. She is very happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin to her.

loans.use: to buy stone, sand, wood, cement, iron, nails and other materials to use.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell at her business.

Rosemarie earns more income from running a general store. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.en:
Hermelinda is applying for a loan of $600 from Tuba Rai Metin (TRM). She is 25 years old, and she runs a kiosk in front of her house. She lives in a town nearby a school, so her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy goods, including students.

Hermelinda will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store, such as rice, noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, coffee, body lotion, Coca Cola, Sprite, sagiko, eggs and candles. She is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, coffee, body lotion, Coca Cola, Sprite, sagiko, eggs and candles.

loans.name: Cresilda

texts.en:
Cresilda farms together with her husband. She has been operating her farming business for five years and earns a net income of 15,200 PHP. 

Cresilda is 54 years old, married and has seven adult-aged children. She is from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. 

In 2014, Cresilda joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She successfully repaid a previous loan of 2,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used for personal purposes. Cresilda is requesting her second loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase bags of fertilizers for her farming activity.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers for her farming activity.

loans.name: Luz Marcelly

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Copacabana desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas rápidas en un pequeño puesto ubicado en la calle.

Estos alimentos los vende durante las tardes.

Luz desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos insumos como carne y queso para continuar realizando sus recetas, además de comprar una sombrilla para cubrir su puesto de la lluvia y el sol.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Luz is a modest and hard-working woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to looking after her children. She lives in the town of Copacabana where she does amazing work in the kitchen, since she has a business preparing fast food on a small stall located in the street. She sells the food during the evening. 

Luz wants to increase her food sales and wants to be more comfortable while working. This is the reason she is asking for a loan to buy some supplies such as meat and cheese in order to continue producing her recipes. She also wants to buy an umbrella to protect her stall from the rain and the sun.

This loan will allow her to move her business forward so that she can get the income she needs from it, which will give her the opportunity to continue supporting her family. This opportunity is being provided to her by Corporación Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy some supplies such as meat and cheese to continue producing her recipes and buy an umbrella to protect her stall from the rain and the sun.

loans.name: Pach's Group

texts.en:
Pach is a 35-year-old mother of two schoolchildren, living in the Kampong Cham province. She has been a grocery seller and a rice farmer for more than five years, and she is able to earn an income of about 75,700 KHR per day to support her family’s living. 

For Pach, this is her second loan cycle with VisionFund, Kiva's Field Partner. She does not have enough funds to buy a decent latrine for her family’s use, so she decided to lead a group to take this new loan. The previous loan helped her create a better living condition, and she believes that this new loan will bring her family a better standard of living and help her children grow up healthy.

loans.use: to buy a decent latrine.

loans.name: Munkhkhuyag

texts.en:
Munkhkhuyag, 45 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. 

He has been working as a security officer since 2011. His wife is currently unemployed and stays at home, taking care of house chores. 

Their eldest daughter studies at university and didn't pay the tuition fee. So he is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to pay the tuition fee of his daughter. Using his previous loan, he also paid the tuition fee of his daughter, showing great concern for his children's education.

loans.use: to pay tuition fee.

loans.name: Obed

texts.en:
Obed is 28 years old and lives in the town of Ntungamo in the Mbarara region of Uganda. He is married and has one child. For the past two years, Obed has been working hard to manage his bar, where he sells beer, soda, and water. 

To help expand his business, Obed requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more beers and sodas, and will help Obed to generate greater profits and expand his business. Obed hopes that in the future he will be able to earn profits. 

Obed is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Obed who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to buy more beers and sodas.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 61-year-old married father of six children. He is a Palestinian refugee, who has been working and living in a Palestinian camp since he was born.

Mahmoud works in the furniture making business. He has 37 years of experience in this field, which is enough to earn customers' trust and to be skilled in what he does.

Mahmoud's income is just fine, but because of his family's increasing life demands, his income is not good enough to expand his business and reply to increasing customer requests. For this reason, he decided to acquire a loan from Kiva's Field Partner, Al Majmoua, to buy wood and accessories necessary for his business development, and to make a special requested furniture project.

Mahmoud has been an Al Majmoua borrower for four consecutive loan cycles. He stated that his previous loan helped him a lot in manufacturing bedrooms and selling them. This helped increase his income, and he proved to be a good standing borrower.

loans.use: to buy wood and accessories necessary for his business development, and to make a special requested furniture project.

loans.name: F.k.f Group

texts.en:
Katia is the featured borrower of F.K.F. group. She and the other group members got together to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been neighbors and friends. They work hard to develop their businesses and families at the same time.

Katia is the lady at the far right side of the picture. She is a 21-year-old single lady who has special hairdressing and makeup vocational training. Three years ago, she started her own beauty services business. She operates her business at her parents' house until she becomes financially capable of opening her own separate beauty salon in the future.

Katia is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary hair colors, hair treatments, and air conditioning to keep her customers comfortable, especially through the hot summer season.

As for the other group members, Faten is the lady in the center, while Fatima is the first on the left.
